
```{r key-period-dispatch-region-{{period.name}}-{{region.name}}, results='asis', include=TRUE}
p.name = '{{period.name}}' # Set key period name
r.name = '{{region.name}}' # Set region name
cat("### ", p.name, ': ', r.name) # Print out key period and region name above plot
text.plot=11
figure.width = 9
figure.height = 6
```

```{r key-period-dispatch-plots-region-{{period.name}}-{{region.name}}, fig.width=figure.width, fig.height=figure.height, include=TRUE}
stack.data = gen.type.region[Period==p.name & Region==r.name, ]
# Make plot if data exists for this region
if (length(stack.data[, value])>0 & sum(stack.data[, value])>0 ) {
  p1 = dispatch_plot(stack.data, gen.load.region[Period==p.name & Region==r.name, ])
  print(p1)
} else { print('No generation found for this period and region.')}
```
